name: Epic War 5: Hell's Gate
summary: Epic War 5 is a strategy game, where you get to fight for the territory. This time with 3 heroes, 30 units, and 70 different skills. Construct a massive army, build up your base defenses and attack the enemy base. The most important thing - don't let your hero die. The fifth game of Epic War; features include new dialogue and refined progression system.
